overview:
Beth Ferreira is the Chief Operating Officer of Fab.com.

Prior to joining Fab in October 2011, Beth was an operations consultant to many NYC startups you might recognize (Birchbox,Pixable, JOOR, Nestio, RedRover Networks, fundedbuy, ofakind, and postling). Before that, Beth was VP of Operations & Finance at Etsy and a member of the investment team at VC firm Flatiron Partners. She has also held positions at The Boston Consulting Group where she advised media, consumer and technology clients on critical strategic and operational challenge. Beth began her career as an investment banker at Union Bank of Switzerland. She holds a bachelors degree from the University of Pennsylvania and an MBA from the Wharton School of Business. You can also find her blogging at www.earlystager.com.

At Fab, Beth oversees all operations, logistics and customer service. She loves making people smile.
